name: Playbook for Mitigating Malicious Script Injection Incident
description: This playbook addresses an incident where an attacker exploited a vulnerable web application to execute malicious scripts, leading to command execution and data exfiltration.

parallel--27a1b12b-9eae-45e2-bb16-47da0e.description: Perform simultaneous actions to mitigate the impact of the attack.

action--a5a8c3af-bdc8-4f3a-b222-9c93cee2.name: Kill malicious process
action--a5a8c3af-bdc8-4f3a-b222-9c93cee2.description: Terminate the running malicious script process if it exists.

action--b9225de4-9f90-4e8d-9f9d-d223c709.name: Audit server logs
action--b9225de4-9f90-4e8d-9f9d-d223c709.description: Review server logs for any suspicious activities.
action--b9225de4-9f90-4e8d-9f9d-d223c709.loop: repeat until all logs have been reviewed

action--c7329cbd-ebd1-4d93-bcd0-5a4893d5.name: Block outgoing traffic to malicious IP
action--c7329cbd-ebd1-4d93-bcd0-5a4893d5.description: Prevent any outgoing traffic to identified malicious IP.

action--f5c73e8b-04fd-46c8-af4f-6b3a079b.description: Install and configure Intrusion Detection System to monitor activities.

action--a5723fc8-3d1e-4c03-b4da-8b4b4f2b.description: Perform a full system scan for any remaining threats.
